Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:

|m=tā

|h=pfs=thâ

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In traditional Chinese, there is generally a distinction between {{zh-l|*它}} and {{zh-l|*牠}}; the former refers exclusively to [[inanimate]] objects, while the latter refers exclusively to [[animal]]s.
* In simplified Chinese, only {{zh-l|*它}} is used for both [[inanimate]] [[object]]s and [[animal]]s.
